attributes.action: reduce or withdraw tax on the armed forces pension if servicemen or women have completed the full 22 years service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Servicemen and women are constantly paid less than other countries forces because we get what they call the x factor. They are led to believe that due to their pension and overall package when they leave the forces that their lower pay and tax paid even when overseas balances out. It does not because as soon as they leave and get given a military pension it gets taxed to the hilt.
